title: Google releases Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 for Pixel phones
content:
With each passing day, we grow closer and closer to the eventual release of Google Pixel’s June Feature Drop. In case you are yearning to see what the future holds for the forthcoming update of Android, Google has you covered for today. The company has just announced Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 for eligible Pixel

The post Google releases Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 for Pixel phones appeared first on XDA.
description: Android 12's June Feature Drop, or QPR3, Beta 3 has now been released, and you can download and install it on a compatible Pixel phone today.
